item.title: Compute1 Cloud Maintenance
item.content:encoded:
In order to further improve our product quality and guarantee the stability of our services, we will perform maintenance on our cloud servers.

The maintenance work will take place on Monday, 08th of August 2022 at 10:00 (CEST) and will end at approximately 10:30 (CEST), although we will try to keep the interruption as minimal as possible.

During this time, cloud servers may be temporarily unavailable and will be shutdown via APCI (Software Shutdown).

Thank you for your understanding.

2022-08-08T08:00:00.000Z
Update

We are beginning with the maintenance now. Instances might be unavailable during this time.

2022-08-08T08:40:00.000Z
Update

We are currently having issues with the control plane and are unable to start the VMs. The issue is currently being investigated, however we are unable to give an exact timeframe when the services will recover. This page will be updated as soon as we have more information.

2022-08-08T12:05:00.000Z
Restoring Services

Some Control plane services have been restored to allow VMs to be started. Instances should now be reachable and start/stop via the web panel should be possible. We are still working on restoring other services, such as volume/image management. This page will be updated as soon as more information becomes available.

2022-08-08T13:00:00.000Z
Resolved

All services have been restored. We apologize for the prolonged downtime. Due to an issue during a control plane upgrade, we were unable to start the instances after the completed maintenance on compute hosts. Due to several incompatibilities we were required to upgrade other services as well.

item.title: Compute1 Cloud Maintenance
item.content:encoded:
In order to further improve our product quality and guarantee the stability of our services, we will perform maintenance on our cloud servers.

The maintenance work will take place on Friday, 15th of July 2022 at 10:00 (CEST) and will end at approximately 10:30 (CEST), although we will try to keep the interruption as minimal as possible.

During this time, cloud servers may be temporarily unavailable and will be shutdown via APCI (Software Shutdown).

Thank you for your understanding.

2022-07-15T08:00:00.000Z
Update

We are beginning with the maintenance now. Instances might be unavailable during this time.

2022-07-15T08:35:00.000Z
Update

Instances are currently booting and we are monitoring the process.

2022-07-15T08:45:00.000Z
Completed

All instances are back online. Maintenance is now complete.

item.title: power failure at Düsseldorf site
item.description:
We currently have a power outage at the Düsseldorf site
We are already working on a solution
item.content:encoded:
Currently, the entire city power network in Düsseldorf is disrupted. The USV systems of the data centers have taken over the power supply.

2022-06-22T15:12:00.000Z
Update

Due to the power outage, some air conditioners have failed, causing server heat issues and shutdowns. We are currently in direct contact with the datacenter to solve the problem as quickly as possible.

2022-06-22T16:35:00.000Z
Update

The air conditioning units have now been brought back up and the temperature in the cold aisle has returned to normal. We are now starting to ramp up the systems that were shut down due to the high temperature.

2022-06-22T16:50:00.000Z
Update

All systems are back up and all services are stabilizing again.

2022-06-22T17:00:00.000Z
Resolved

The problem has been resolved. All services are up and running in normal operation mode.

We apologies to our customers impacted by the consequences of the power failure.

item.title: network connectivity issues
item.description:
Due to a well-distributed DoS attack towards multiple prefixes we currently experience network stability issues for DDoS protected traffic currently routed via our external DDoS mitigation service provider. We are already working on a solution.
We are already working on a solution
item.content:encoded:
Due to a well-distributed DoS attack towards multiple prefixes we currently experience network stability issues for DDoS protected traffic currently routed via our external DDoS mitigation service provider. We are already working on a solution.

2022-06-09T20:15:00.000Z
Update

The permanent DDoS protection / filter rules of our external DDoS mitigation service provider has been established for a wide amount of prefixes in order to establish regular network operation again. But we still do experience some issues for some prefixes. We are currently in direct contact with the external DDoS mitigation service provider to solve the problem as quickly as possible.

2022-06-09T21:52:00.000Z
Resolved

The problem has been resolved. All services are up and running in normal operation mode. We are still in direct contact with our external DDoS mitigation service provide in order to improve the quality of the service for the future.

We apologies to our customers impacted by the consequences of the DDoS attack.

item.title: network connectivity issues
item.description:
Due to a technical problem, there are currently limitations in the network connection.
We are already working on a solution
item.content:encoded:
Due to a technical problem, there are currently limitations in the network connection.

We are already working on a solution

2022-05-13T05:05:00.000Z
Update

The technical error has been fixed and the network is stabilizing again.

2022-05-13T06:30:00.000Z
Resolved

Our technicians were able to resolve the technical error and restore proper operation of the network. We apologize for the inconvenience caused.

item.title: cloud vps maintenance
item.content:encoded:
In order to further improve our product quality and guarantee the stability of our services, we regularly perform maintenance work on our systems.

The maintenance work will take place on Wednesday, 13.04.2022 at 13:00 (CEST).

During this time, all cloud servers will be temporarily unavailable. We will shutdown any cloud server's via APCI (Software Shutdown).

Thank you for your understanding

2022-04-13T06:46:00.000Z
Update

Unfortunately, contradictions have arisen in the specification of the time zone. The maintenance work will take place today (13.04.2022) at 13 o'clock CEST.

2022-04-13T11:17:00.000Z
Update

The maintenance might take a bit longer than expected. We are beginning now with shutting down the Cloud Servers.

2022-04-13T13:21:00.000Z
Resolved

The maintenance has been completed. Unfortunately due to hardware defects it took longer than expected and we had to replace some network components.

We apologise for the inconvenience.

item.title: network connectivity issues
item.description:
Due to a hardware problem, there are currently limitations in the network connection.
We are already working on a solution
item.content:encoded:
Due to a hardware problem, there are currently limitations in the network connection.

We are already working on a solution

2022-03-13T16:42:19.000Z
Update

The hardware error has been fixed and the network is stabilizing again.

2022-03-13T17:08:03.000Z
Resolved

Our on-site technicians were able to repair the faulty hardware and restore proper operation from the network. We apologize for the inconvenience caused.

item.title: compute13 maintenance
item.content:encoded:
In order to further improve our product quality and guarantee the stability of our services, we regularly perform maintenance work on our systems.

The maintenance work will take place on Friday, 04.03.2022 at 09:00 (CET).

During this time, cloud servers on compute13 will be temporarily unavailable. Cloud Servers that are already off will be migrated first. Afterwards we will shutdown any cloud server's that are still running via APCI (Software Shutdown).

Thank you for your understanding

item.title: compute01 Maintenance
item.content:encoded:
In order to further improve our product quality and guarantee the stability of our services, we regularly carry out maintenance work on our systems.

The maintenance work will take place on Friday, 28.01.2022 at 09:00 (CET) and will last up to one hour.

During this time, cloud servers on compute01 will be unavailable. During the maintenance window, we will shut down the cloud servers via APCI (Software Shutdown).

Thank you for your understanding

2022-01-28T08:55:00.000Z
Resolved

The maintenance has been completed. All cloud servers are online again.

item.title: Billing Panel Maintenance
item.content:encoded:
We are performing scheduled maintenance on 11th of November 2021 from 10:00 to 12:00 (CEST). During this time the billing panel will be unavailable.

2021-11-11T11:10:00.000Z
Resolved

The maintenance has been completed.

item.title: network connectivity issues
item.description: Due to a technical problem, the network connectivity of individual IP addresses is currently limited. We are already working on a solution
item.content:encoded:
Due to a technical problem, the network connectivity of individual IP addresses is currently limited. We are already working on a solution

2021-11-03T08:48:24.000Z
Resolved

The reason for the network issue was a bug in one of our packet forwarding engines. The malfunction has been repaired and the network is stable again.

item.title: Billing System Maintenance
item.content:encoded:
On 27.07.2021 we will perform maintenance work on our billing system from 12pm to 2pm (CEST). During this time, the Customer Center will be completely or partially unavailable.

2021-07-27T12:00:00.000Z
Update

The maintenance work is delayed by about 60min. Sorry for the inconvenience

2021-07-27T13:00:00.000Z
Resolved

The maintenance has been completed.

item.title: Maintenance on tshost.myvirtualserver.com
item.content:encoded:
The maintenance work will take place on Tuesday the 27.07.2021 at 10 A.M. (CEST) and will probably last 20 minutes, during this time the whole teamspeak host will be unavailable. This maintenance work is necessary to further improve the quality of our products.

We apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.

2021-07-27T08:20:39.662Z
Resolved

The maintenance has been completed.

item.title: Maintenance on web01.vnetso.com
item.content:encoded:
The maintenance work will take place on Saturday the 24.07.2021 at 11 P.M. (CEST) and will probably last 120 minutes, during this time the whole webspace including (depending on your configuration) website and mail will be unavailable. This maintenance work is necessary to further improve the quality of our products.

We apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.

2021-07-24T23:35:00.000Z
Resolved

The maintenance has been completed.

item.title: Billing system and Teamspeak Host malfunction
item.description: Currently our billing system and the Teamspeak host are not available due to a technical error. Our specialists are already working on a solution.
item.content:encoded:
Currently our billing system and the Teamspeak host are not available due to a technical error. Our specialists are already working on a solution.

2021-06-10T10:39:23.000Z
Resolved

Due to a software error on a node, the billing system, web01 and the Teamspeak host were not accessible. The problem has been fixed since 10:40 UTC. We apologize for the inconvenience.

item.title: Some VPS offline
item.description: We are receiving reports of some VPS being offline and are currently investigating the issue.
item.content:encoded:
We are receiving reports of some VPS being offline and are currently investigating the issue.

2021-05-24T17:50:02.000Z
Resolved

Due to a distributed attack some VPS experienced degraded network stability. The network is stable again since 17:10 UTC. We apologise for the inconvenience.

item.title: Billing System Maintenance
item.content:encoded:
We are performing maintenance on our billing system.

2021-05-03T08:48:00.000Z
Resolved

Maintenance is now complete..

item.title: Billing System Maintenance
item.content:encoded:
We are performing maintenance on our billing system.

2021-04-26T11:57:44.649Z
Resolved

Maintenance is now complete..

item.title: Upgrade of core router equipment
item.description: Core Switches and Router are replaced with better hardware to increase throughput.
item.content:encoded:
We are replacing core switches and router hardware to increase throughput and scale the network.

Expect short network outages or degraded stability of up to 5 minutes during the maintenance window.

2021-03-30T07:33:30.119Z
Update

We are beginning with the maintenance shortly. Expect interruptions of up to 5 minutes during the maintenance window.

2021-03-30T08:50:48.568Z
Resolved

Maintenance is now complete. There was a single interruption of 30 seconds for IPv4 traffic and 5 minutes for IPv6 traffic.

item.title: Dedicated Server Relocation
item.description: We are relocating dedicated server hardware of a few customers
item.content:encoded:
We are relocating dedicated server hardware of a few customers. Affected customers have been notified via email.

2021-03-29T17:14:14.215Z
Resolved

We have completed the maintenance. Affected customers were offline for less than 5 minutes.
